law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 449, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 133. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 281. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 117a, 4551-4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Costs to be taxed in Court of Appeals or Supreme Court.
